formElement.label: Change ID:
formElement.documentation: The change id to be built. i.e: 'Iada3f772'. (Required)

formElement.label: Gerrit Config:
formElement.documentation: The name of the config which holds all the connection information for Gerrit. (Required)

formElement.label: Patch ID:
formElement.documentation: The patch set id to be built. i.e: '1'. (Required)

formElement.label: Project:
formElement.documentation: The project that contains the change to build. (Required)
